mapper.select: SELECT gcr.generic_category_root_id genericCategoryRootId sc.shipping_calculation_id shippingCalculationId, sc.shipping_calculation_name_id shippingCalculationNameId, sc.free_shipping_promo hasFreeShippingPromo, sc.free_shipping_price freeShippingPrice FROM mmc.dbo.shipping_calculation sc WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category_shipping_calculation gcsc WITH(NOLOCK) ON sc.shipping_calculation_id = gcsc.shipping_calculation_id INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category gc WITH(NOLOCK) ON gcsc.generic_category_id = gc.generic_category_id INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category_root gcr WITH(NOLOCK) ON gc.generic_category_id = gcr.generic_category_id WHERE gcr.siteId = #{siteId} AND (gcr.storeId = #{storeId} OR gcr.storeId = 0) AND gcr.generic_category_root_purpose_id = 1 AND sc.shipping_calculation_name_id = #{shippingCalculationNameId}

SELECT sc.shipping_calculation_id shippingCalculationId, sc.shipping_calculation_name_id shippingCalculationNameId, sc.free_shipping_promo hasFreeShippingPromo, sc.free_shipping_price freeShippingPrice, gcr.generic_category_root_id genericCategoryRootId, FROM mmc.dbo.generic_category_product_uniqueid gcpu WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category gc WITH(NOLOCK) ON gcpu.generic_category_id = gc.generic_category_id INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category_shipping_calculation gcsc WITH(NOLOCK) ON gc.generic_category_id= gcsc.generic_category_id INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.shipping_calculation sc WITH(NOLOCK) ON gcsc.shipping_calculation_id =sc.shipping_calculation_id INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.generic_category_root gcr WITH(NOLOCK) ON gcpu.generic_category_root_id = gcr.generic_category_root_id WHERE gcr.generic_category_root_id = #{genericCategoryRootId} AND gcpu.uniqueId = #{productUniqueId} AND sc.shipping_calculation_name_id = #{shippingCalculationNameId} AND gc.active = 1
